entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as being spoken to by Mrs Weasley and is described as having long red hair.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as speaking to Ginny and withdrawing from the room.

entities.name: phlegm
entities.description: Phlegm is mentioned as someone Ginny suspects Mrs Weasley wants to be alone with.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur is mentioned as an example of a ballerina by Ginny.

entities.name: fred and george
entities.description: Fred and George are mentioned as having something Hermione is peering into.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as peering into Fred and George's something.

relationships.description: Ginny suspects that Mrs Weasley wants to be alone with Phlegm.
Fleur is an example of a ballerina, as described by Ginny.
Hermione is peering into something belonging to Fred and George.
